Emmett Coon

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Emmet
  2. Foster Name: Unknown
  3. Foster Family: Chester H. and Susan L. Clark
  4. Location of Family: Macon, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Southern Tier Orphan's Home
  6. Arrival Place: Red Cloud, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 4
  8. Date of Birth: Unknown
  9. Date of Death: 7/27/1962, Greeley, CO
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: 1880 United States Federal Census; www.familysearcg - Individual Record for Emmet Coon; www.usgennet; The Red Cloud Chief, 27 May 1880.
